scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n web,api "pnpm -C apps/web dev" "cd services/api && . venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/web lint && cd services/api && ruff check .
scripts.test: pnpm -C apps/web test && cd services/api && pytest -q
scripts.setup: pnpm install && cd services/api && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -e .
